scripts.setup:sqlite: npx node-pre-gyp install --directory=node_modules/sqlite3 || echo 'SQLite3 binary installation skipped'
scripts.build:archimate-js: mkdir -p apps/extension/dist/archimate-js && rm -rf apps/extension/dist/archimate-js/* && cd packages/archimate-js && OUTPUT_PATH=../../apps/extension/dist/archimate-js npm run build
scripts.build:plantuml-js: mkdir -p apps/extension/dist/plantuml-js && rm -rf apps/extension/dist/plantuml-js/* && cd packages/plantuml-js && OUTPUT_PATH=../../apps/extension/dist/plantuml-js pnpm run build
scripts.build:webview: cd apps/webview && pnpm run build && mkdir -p ../extension/dist/webview && rm -rf ../extension/dist/webview/* && cp -r dist/* ../extension/dist/webview/
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p apps/extension/dist/webview && rm -rf apps/extension/dist/webview/* && cp -r apps/webview/dist/* apps/extension/dist/webview/
scripts.build: pnpm run build:extension && pnpm run build:webview && pnpm run build:archimate-js && pnpm run build:plantuml-js
scripts.build:ci: pnpm run build:archimate-js && pnpm run build:extension
scripts.stash:pop: git stash && git stash pop stash@{1} && git read-tree stash && git stash drop
scripts.package: pnpm run build && cd apps/extension && pnpm run package
